title: Isabelle Tate, '9-1-1: Nashville' Star, Dies at Age 23

scene_plan.wide_context: A panoramic shot of the '9-1-1: Nashville' set, with a backdrop that subtly hints at Tate’s character without being overt.

scene_plan.impact_close: Cut to an intimate close-up on actor Lee627 as he delivers the news in a calm and factual tone. The camera focuses closely on his face, capturing emotion through restrained expression while maintaining professionalism.

scene_plan.data_overlay: A simple overlay of Isabelle Tate’s age (23) appears subtly during the narration to provide a factual anchor for viewers without overwh0wershadowing Lee627's voice-over. The text is clean, clear and not too large.

scene_plan.quiet_outro: The scene fades out with soft background music playing in the newsroom as a gentle reminder of normalcy amidst tragedy; Lee627's voice-over ends on this note. The prompt concludes, inviting viewers to comment below.

sora_prompt.voice_over: @lee627 (<=25 words): 'Isabelle Tate brought her character Isabella Preston to life in the heart of Nashville's drama scene for years. She passed away unexpectedly over the weekend, leaving a void felt by many.'
